rounds.comments: (Alex: Each correct response will be a single letter of the alphabet that you would add to one of the words in the clue.)

clues.text: Take this letter, wrap it in towel, & it becomes a masonry tool
It turns the Greek letter lambda into a sexy dance
When this letter is added to flame it becomes a flaming dessert
Add this letter to cafe & you get a word meaning to irritate by rubbing
This letter turns the classic movie "Gigi" into a less than classic 2003 film
Morose character whose first line is "A little more than kin, and less than kind"
Shakespeare puns on his own name in the sonnet opening "Whoever hath her wish, thou hast thy" this
The wounded Mercutio says, "You shall find me" this type of "man", & he doesn't just mean "serious"
Punning 3-word completion of "Now is the winter of our discontent made glorious summer by this..."
Think our puns are lame?  Look at the "on"/"one" business between Valentine & his servant in this comedy
During World War I, this city leased the area from the feds for use as a park
In the Civil War it was the fort's function, not just for soldiers but for newspaper editors & other troublesome types
After commanding the fleet bombing the fort, George Cockburn's next big job was bringing Napoleon here
The fort features a monument to Francis Scott Key, who's seen as this mythical musical maestro
A movie you can watch at the visitor center, it was also the original title of Francis Scott Key's poem
This state's official marine mammal is the bowhead whale, which inhabits Arctic waters
In 1996 Keiko the whale was sent from Mexico City to Newport, Oregon via this parcel company
Whoa!  Reaching 80 feet or more in length, the finback whale is second in size only to this one
One of the 2 3-letter terms for a group of whales
Gray whales are an example of this toothless class of whales that also have 2 blowholes

rounds.comments: (Alex: We're going to need the first and the last name, please.)

clues.text:
A CCR title:
"Left a good job in the city, workin' for the man every night and day"

"What you want, baby, I got it, what you need, do you know I got it?"

"First I was afraid, I was petrified"
"Deep down in Louisiana, close to New Orleans, way back up in the woods among the evergreens"

Wayne & Garth rocked out to it:
"Is this the real life, is this just fantasy"
These insects often cause more damage to homes per year than fires, tornadoes & earthquakes combined
When disturbed, this appropriately named insect gives off a smelly odor
Up to 2 inches long, the palmetto bug of Florida is one of these pests
Often fatal, Rocky Mountain spotted fever is transmitted by the dog type or Rocky Mountain wood type of this
The potter or mason type of this is named for its pot-shaped mud nest
In the English rules for this sport, the rope must be 35 meters long & you can't start until the judge says "pull"
The 4 basic skills needed for this team jump rope sport are entering, turning, jumping & exiting
The eyelet of a lariat, it has the same name as a Japanese automaker
In the 19th c. this plant first cultivated in China had become so widely used that its name came to mean "rope"
The spinning circle of the lariat has this menacing name
Once a famous mining community, this Western Nevada town is now chiefly an attraction for tourists
Winning 1971's Virginia Slims Thunderbird Tennis tournament, she broke the $100,000 total for a year, a women's first
Population 439,000, it's the V.B. in Va.
This author of "To the Lighthouse" became manic depressive after her mother's death in 1895
The CSS Virginia was this former Union ship, salvaged & iron-plated

Show us some backbone by giving us this synonym of the backbone
